short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you need the meaning for a word, we'll direct you to web-based dictionaries that provides the definition.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you need the meaning for a word, we'll direct you to web-based dictionaries that provides the definition.

Search unknown word easily and quickly in multiple web-based dictionaries. 
Modify order of appearance of dictionaries.
